    • getPropertyNameFromSetter

      public static String getPropertyNameFromSetter(Method m)
      Returns the property name corresponding to the specified method, which is assumed to be a setter. If the method cannot be identified as a setter, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      m - The method from which to extract a property name
      Returns:
      The name of the property corresponding to the method
